name: Casa S. Miguel 6 - The Yellow House
summary: The S. Miguel 6 House is a traditional Porto's building located in the UNESCO World Heritage area, surrounded by a charismatic and authentic atmosphere, open the window and breathe the soul of Porto! N. Registo 27164/AL. Near Station Sao Bento Cleaning fees included in the price.
space: The ideal place to stay with family, friends or on businesses, can accommodate up to 8 guests. The house  has been refurbished and furnished recently, preserving its old character and adding the quality of nowadays comfort. Free Wifi, 130 TV channels, sound system, board games (cards, chess, draughts, mikado, domino) and books are available. Bed linen, bath towels, beach towels hair dryer and straighteners. The bathroom shower gel, shampoo and toilet paper will be provided.  Kitchen: hob, oven, extractor, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, kettle, fridge/freezer, washing and dryer machines, iron and iron board, stick blender set, vacuum cleaner, cutlery, glassware, complete kitchen ware and cleaning products are available. Baby eating chair and baby cot are available. The house is comprised of three floors: - Ground floor: Entrance with a spacious open living room, kitchen and dining space; - First floor: small living room with sofa bed and access to balcony + double bedroom with acce
description: The S. Miguel 6 House is a traditional Porto's building located in the UNESCO World Heritage area, surrounded by a charismatic and authentic atmosphere, open the window and breathe the soul of Porto! N. Registo 27164/AL. Near Station Sao Bento Cleaning fees included in the price. The ideal place to stay with family, friends or on businesses, can accommodate up to 8 guests. The house  has been refurbished and furnished recently, preserving its old character and adding the quality of nowadays comfort. Free Wifi, 130 TV channels, sound system, board games (cards, chess, draughts, mikado, domino) and books are available. Bed linen, bath towels, beach towels hair dryer and straighteners. The bathroom shower gel, shampoo and toilet paper will be provided.  Kitchen: hob, oven, extractor, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, kettle, fridge/freezer, washing and dryer machines, iron and iron board, stick blender set, vacuum cleaner, cutlery, glassware, complete kitchen ware and cleaning products
neighborhood_overview: The S. Miguel 6 house is located in the heart of the historical Porto's area, just 5 minute walk from "Torre dos Clerigos"  This house is located in a privileged and quiet location with access to the fantastic view of the city and Douro river from the "Miradouro  da Vitoria"  across the street.  The "Mosteiro de S. Bento da Vitoria" is a minute walk away. The vibrant Porto's night life is just 5 minute walk way. Come discover Porto and feel at home!
notes: Pets are welcome, but an additional cleaning fee of 40 euros per stay will apply.
transit: Nearest train station:  By subway - Stop SÃO BENTO - about 700m - 10 min walk.  By train - Stop SÃO BENTO - about 700m - 10 min walk. If you are carrying heavy and bulky luggage is recommended to take a taxi from the airport. If you arrive by car please note that there is free public car park spaces on the street, first come first serve basis. Alternatively there are also paid car park spaces near by.
access: Access to the entire house. You will have the entire house and privacy during your stay.
interaction: I am always available to respond to any queries, and of course to greet you at your arrival.
house_rules: Please don´t smoke indoors; please use the balconies. Our community is very quiet, please respect our neighbor's. Please leave the house as you found it: take the waste out, turn all lights and heating off and close the windows. At your arrival I will require to see your passport, in order to complete the Portuguese Immigration and Borders Service (SEF) form. This is a legal requirement to those who provide the accommodation to guests, including nationals of other member states of the European Union. Please note that check in and check out times are flexible, please let me know in advance the estimate time of your arrival and departure.

host.host_about:
Hello, I am Ana, I enjoy travelling and meeting new people. 
I have a passion for old buildings, love to refurbish them and bring them back to peoples life. The house in Porto is located in the Old Town Centre and Porto is a fantastic city with plenty to do and see. 
The house in Figueira da Foz is also located in the Old Town Centre close to all amenities. Figueira is in the Centre of Portugal and offers sandy beaches, a Casino and events all year round!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Pasamos cuatro días estupendos en Oporto y ya con ganas de volver.
La casa está muy bien situada en la zona histórica de la ciudad y permite hacer las visitas a la mayoría de los sitios turísticos andando.
Es una casa muy bien rehabilitada en un edificio antiguo y tuvimos la suerte de ser los primeros en disfrutarla. 
La atención de Ana es excelente y la respuesta a las cuestiones previas que le planteamos antes del viaje fue muy rápida, casi inmediata, y con mucha información útil para la estancia.
No nos queda más que agradecer su hospitalidad y esperar que no esté alquilada para cuando nos decidamos a volver.

Ana was a wonderful and gracious host. She was always accessible, punctual and welcoming. The apartment was truly incredible and just as pictured in the Airbnb description with plenty of space for everyone. The apartment is in a fantastic location, right down the street from the Torre dos Clerigos which means that all of Porto's major sights are within walking distance. The only tricky part is finding parking near the house if you drove a car to Porto. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Porto.

Ana has been really helpful and welcoming. She even got us some special things as we were travelling with our 2 little girls.
She answered to our "request" immediately with extreme efficiency....like I rarely have seen before.
(For example, she changed the microwave in only a few hours after we mentioned her it was not working).
The apartment is in a perfect location, just a few step from one of the best view of Porto and Gaia. 
There was parking in the streets.
We had everything needed and expected.
Ana, thanks again for everything.
We l (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ed Porto and really annoyed our stay at your place!
Ana's house was vey nice. A lot of space, very well equiped, with modern furniture and really close to the center. I reccomend it !
A perfect place for our large group and a lovely view at your doorstep and from your balcony. Communication was easy and beyond accommodating. We had a lovely time.

Todo genial. Ana es super amable: nos facilitó información sobre Oporto, aparcamiento y demás antes de llegar; nos vino a buscar a una plaza cercana para conducirnos hasta la casa (el navegador del coche nos dio algún problemilla..); nos explicó todo sobre la casa y  nos dio información sobre restaurantes.
La casa está muy bien para 8 personas, toda reformada, muy cómoda y todo muy limpio. Los chicos disfrutaron mucho de la sala del sótano con los puffs dejándonos a los padres algo de tiempo de relax... La casa está muy bien ubicada, a 50 mts del Mirador Da Vitória (con unas vistas preciosas de la ciudad y del río) y  a menos de 5 minutos de la Torre de los Clérigos donde hay autobuses urbanos y turísticos además de un pequeño centro comercial con algunos restaurantes y bares de copas.
En general es una casa perfecta que recomendamos a quien quiera disfrutar de Oporto estando en el centro de casi todo  ¡¡¡Muchísimas gracias por todo, Ana!!!  Si volvemos a Oporto, repetiremos en tu preciosa casa.  Un abrazo,

Ana e seu marido foram extremamente receptivos. Estavam na casa na hora que chegamos e nos receberam muito bem. Nos ajudaram a estacionar o carro, com as malas, nos falaram sobre o Porto e deram dicas sobre a região. 
A casa é uma delicia, super bem equipada, muito bem localizada e com quartos amplos e banheiros excelentes.

Even though we were a little late, Ana gave us a very warm welcome, made us feel at home right away and even helped us with parking our car. The house was clean, spacious, comfortable and had everything we required. The location was fantastic. Would definitely recommend. Thank you Ana! :)

Het huis was exact zoals beschreven; ruim, schoon en gezellig ingericht.
De ligging in het centrum is perfect. Echt een goede uitvalsbasis voor het bezoeken van de stad. een echt buiten terras is er niet maar door de ligging is er altijd een terras dicht in de buurt.
Kortom; een aanrader.

Ancienne maison typique, totalement rénovée et très bien située, à proximité à pied de tous les points importants à visiter dans le vieux Porto. Proche des transports publics. Quartier calme. Ana a été aux petits soins pour nous rendre le séjour agréable. La maison est équipée de tout ce qui est nécessaire. Excellente literie. A recommander sans aucune hésitation

la característica fundamental de este alojamiento es su situación. Por otro lado la dueña tiene buen gusto y está bien  amueblado y tiene unas camas estupendas. Únicamente decir que la gente se pone hablar en la calle delante del edificio y eso si hay un montón . L comunicación con la dueña es fácil y cómoda

Staying at Ana`s place was one of our best experiences. Starting with the excellent communication with Ana and her very beautiful apartment. Ana`s apt is exactly as in the photos, modern, clean, comfy and with all the necessary items for our stay. Everything was first class. Thank you for a fantastic weekend in Porto

The apartment is in a wonderful location within super easy walking distance of all of the wonderful treasures of Porto.  We easily walked to the Tower and all of the churches and walked along the river.  There are so many amazing, local restaurants right in the neighborhood, and the coffee shop that is only 50 feet from the apartment was amazing with incredibly friendly owners and great food and coffee.  The weather during our visit was unseasonably cold for Portugal, so the apartment was a bit chilly, but we can't wait to visit again when it is warmer.  The neighborhood is lively and you can hear the cars and people outside the apartment, but it was not a problem for us.  Our host was incredibly helpful!  She introduced us to the owners of the coffee shop and arranged for our very early cab back to the airport.  We loved Porto and would definitely use this apartment if we go back.
Everything perfect! Charming old house with 4 bedrooms and located very well!

Adoramos a estadia nessa casa bicentenária, mas que foi completamente renovada e modernizada. A Ana foi uma anfitriã fantástica nos deixando muito a vontade e com flexibilidade para nos atender  O local é excelente na região histórica e a poucos minutos da Ribeira e de todas as atrações. Recomendamos fortemente.

This house is perfectly located next to everything. It accommodated all of us perfectly. 
Ana introduced us to Fernando who owns the little shop on the next street and it was amazing. Fernando brought us breakfast every morning, he was so sweet. 
The only thing we did not like was the bathrooms. Wish they were a little cleaner.

maison très agréable dans un quartier bien situé par rapport aux points intéressants à voir à Porto.
Très belle vue de Porto depuis la terrasse publique à 20 m de la maison.
Ana nous a très bien accueilli et conseillé pour le séjour.
Nous conseillons cette maison pour les familles voulant profiter de Porto dans les meilleures conditions.

Adoramos a estadia na casa de Ana. Tudo é exatamente como nas fotos: bem equipado, limpo e organizado. Perfeito para grupos grandes. As histórias sobre a região onde a casa está são fantásticas. A localização é perfeita para se locomover pela cidade com facilidade. Muito comércio no entorno, mas bem tranquilo para dormir. A vista do miradouro na mesma rua é incrível. Ana é extremamente receptiva e sempre disposta a ajudar seus hóspedes, como muitos outros moradores de Porto. A cidade é encantadora e acolhedora. Foi uma agradável surpresa em nossa (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos! Um bônus: o café do Senhor Fernando, há alguns metros (que ficou nos esperando com as chaves, pois fizemos o check in bem tarde). Tudo muito gostoso feito por uma família simpática. Recomendamos fortemente a cidade e a casa de Ana!

Casa incrível situada no coração da cidade do Porto, muito bem localizada, limpa, acolhedora. A Ana foi sempre muito acessível e disponível para ajudar em qualquer uma das necessidades. Voltaremos com toda a certeza.

We had an excellent stay in Porto and Ana was the most gracious and helpful host. The townhouse was well-equipped and comfortable. The location was central to all of the sites in Porto, which was great. The townhouse is located at the top of the hill, so we also got a great workout. We were worried that the townhouse did not have air conditioning, but the stone walls kept the place at a comfortable temperature. This place is great for a group and I highly recommend it!

My family of 4 loved staying at Ana's apartment. It was clean, very comfortable, nicely decorated and in an excellent location, close to restaurants and tourist attractions. Ana was a fabulous and helpful host. Would highly recommend Ana's apartment.

The house is full of character, has lovely rooms with nice beds and pillows. It was very clean indeed. Location is very close to historical center, nightlife and restaurants. Round the corner there's is a small shop which Ana recommended in case you want breakfast or food brought in, Just go in and order with Fernando.
Ana has a great smile and she was a great host in all aspects from time of booking to our check out, and her friendliness made us feel very welcomed. 
Ana also helped us by allowing us a place to leave luggage until we were ready to go to airport, giving us the benefit of enjoying another lovely meal round porto center.
I highly recommend this place and Ana as a host. Hope we come back soon.
Thank you very much

Beautiful town house in an old neighbourhood of Porto, very close to the Torre dos Clérigos. The house was exactly as advertised, and fit us(two families of four each) very well. Ana welcomed us with some wine and beer in the fridge, which was very welcome on a  a warm day. She also introduced us to Fernando at the corner store, who brought us breakfast in the morning!  All in all  a very pleasant stay that I'd recommend to anyone.

Our family had such a wonderful stay at this apartment! In the old, historical neighborhood, everything was walking distance with excellent sites to visit, restos, cafes and shops. The apartment was very clean with more amenities than we expected, and the beds very comfortable. I will recommend this place to all my friends and we will definitely come back the next time we're in Porto!

El viaje ha sido fabuloso. La ubicación inmejorable, al igual que la casa.
La casa es exactamente igual que las fotos o incluso mejor. Y bueno, Ana un amor. Se puede contar con ella en todo momento y te da todas las facilidades que puede. 100% recomendable y muy agradecidos!

A truly exceptional home in a great location situated in the heart of the old town. Everything easily accessible on foot. Couldn't ask for better. Ana was a delightful host and even took the time to show my wife around the local restaurants and supermarket and introduce her. A very helpful and kind touch. 

The house is well laid out (3 floors), clean and contains everything you need. It was all just perfect, even down to the SuperBock beers she had ready chilled in the fridge. She obviously has a sixth sense !!

A very strong recommendation from all of my family for a successful stay in the beautiful city of Porto.

We really enjoyed our stay at Ana's rental is Porto. The property is located within the old part of the city and everything is within close walking distance. 

The rental has 3 good sized bedrooms and good living space. The space was more than enough for our teenage children and us. The kitchen is stocked with the basics needed for self catering.   

Ana was an excellent host and was really flexible with check in and check out as the next guests weren't arriving immediately. Ana made us feel very welcome, explained all of the essentials and gave us some local tips on places to eat. 

We would highly recommend this property for anyone wishing to explore Porto. It would suit families or friends alike.
Excelente moradia. Tudo limpo, em perfeito estado. Ideal para famílias.

Fantastic location, as good as it gets for Port.  lovely clean 3 bedroom with lots of space. washer/dryer came in handy as well.
Loved it!

This apartment was wonderful for our stay in Porto.  We were a family of five adults.  The bedrooms accommodated us well, and were comfortable.  We  enjoyed having a kitchen and living room in which to gather.  The apartment was stocked with all the basics you need, including a basic pantry for cooking, and coffee. The location was amazing.  Near the historical sites, convenient to Sao Bento train station, and just around the corner from an incredible view of Porto.  The walk to the Ribeira and Nova de Gaia was no problem for our family.  Ana was very accommodating with check-in and check-out, and arranged a taxi to the airport for our departure.  We definitely recommend this apartment for Porto!

Appartamento super confortevole, dotato di ogni cosa.Arredato con gusto e  con dei letti super. Dal balcone si gode una vista sul Douro e il ponte D Luis. Situato in una posizione strategica. In vicinanza anche un bar per fare una colazione tradizionale gestito e frequentato da persone gentilissime. 
Una bellissima esperienza in un luogo magnifico. Ringraziamo Ana per la sua simpatia e disponibilità nel farci un check in/out personalizzato.

Alojamiento con mucho encanto en una localización perfecta para descubrir y disfrutar la ciudad. Ana nos ayudó en todo y nos dio muy buenas indicaciones para hacer de nuestra estancia una gran experiencia. Para repetir.
Looking forward to our next stay :)

This place is spacious, centrally located, updated and well equipped.  Ana worked with us on our arrival time and was flexible when we arrived early. The location is fantastic and centrally located.  It's a short walk to many sites and only a few blocks from the hop on hop off bus.  Highly recommend!
La mejor ubicación de Oporto. Casa con mucho encanto. Volveremos.

Alojamiento ideal para familias o grupos de amigos. Situación inmejorable, en el centro del casco antiguo de Porto. La casa tiene todos los elementos necesarios para que la estancia sea muy agradable (Sería perfecta con un pequeño lavavajillas). Las camas son muy cómodas. La limpieza es buena y la calefacción eléctrica funciona muy bien. Ana nos dió algunas informaciones muy útiles sobre los servicios de la zona. Cuando volvamos a Porto no dudaremos en volver a "The yellow house". 
Muito obrigado. Saudações,
Marije y familia(incluído Zazpi)
Muy buena opción para alojarse en Oporto a menos de 5 minutos de la Torre de los Clérigos, en pleno barrio judio. La casa tiene tres pisos con tres habitaciones dobles y dos baños.

L'appartement es très bien situé dans le centre historique, correspondant en tout point aux photos. Toute la literie est confortable et l'appartement était très propre. Ana est très accueillante et disponible, elle nous a aidé à trouver un restaurant à notre arrivée, faisant même la réservation pour nous. Nous le recommandons et y retournerons sans hésiter.
Fabulous location, authentic home in old town, with modern amenities and a friendly responsive host!  Would definitely stay here again.

Charming, well-equipped, very clean house on a lovely street in a great, central location.  Comfortable beds.  Three floors provide privacy and lots of space for families or groups of friends.  Host was responsive and kind.  Would absolutely stay here again!
A great place for few days in Porto

Perfect apartment for the 6 of us.  Very comfortable in a great location in Porto's historic Ribeira District.
Ana was very helpful.  We all very much enjoyed our stay in Porto.
Thank you!

At Ana's place, one can expect a kind and responsive host. Her apartment is clean, spacious and adorable. It is in a great location for touring Porto. We were traveling as 5 adults. We had plenty of space, the sights were in walking distance. We all loved the apartment.
Our stay here was lovely. The apartment was in a great location and our host was very accommodating.
Maison agréable et très bien située!

Amazing place and host! The apartment is stylishly decorated and super clean. It is in very convenient and picturesque location - we couldn't have found a better place for our group of 6 people. The beds were all very comfortable and the house is equipped with all the necessities you will need. Ana was quick to respond on (Hidden by Airbnb) and airbnb messaging, and was very accommodating and flexible.
Wonderful place to stay in Porto.  It was a perfect location and so stylish and comfortable.  Ana was there to great us.  Thank you!!!

Wir hatten eine wunderbare Zeit in Porto und in Ana's Haus. Das Haus ist tiptop sauber, sehr schön eingerichtet und mit mehr als nur dem Notwendigen ausgestattet (z.B. kleine Klimaanlagen in den Schlafzimmern, die wir aber gar nciht benötigt haben). Eine klare Empfehlung an alle, die mit einer Gruppe im Zentrum von Porto übernachten wollen.  Wir haben fast alle unsere Ziele zu Fuß erreicht, nur zum Strand haben wir den Bus genommen (ca. 15min Fahrt).  Unsere Gruppe hat sicher sehr wohl gefühlt und wir würden jederzeit wieder buchen. Wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen und auch bei Fragen während unseres Aufenthalts war unsere Ansprechpartnerin immer zur Stelle. Sie hat uns zum Beispiel auch die Taxis für den Flughafentransfer vor dem Rückflug organisiert. Mit einem Wort: Superhost!

Great apartment! Spacious (three bedrooms, living room, dining room, two baths), with comfortable beds, clean and well stocked. Amazing central location in a renovated historic building, yet quiet at night. Quite a gem. Highly recommend!

If you're lucky enough to stay here, check out the historical context of surrounding buildings; enjoy the night time view from the third floor balcony of the river and monastery lit up; the viewpoint of the entire city from the churchyard park next door; the nearby restaurants and monuments. The location is superb. And the house, though 100's of years old is updated and comfortable. Watch out for mosquitoes, since there are no screens on the windows and lovely French doors.
Great location, you can walk to nearly every part of the city. Very friendly welcome
A wonderfull house at a perfect location, just walk to the riverside. The house is very clean and was perfect for 6 adults.

Ana nous a permis d'arriver(beaucoup!) plus tôt dans la journée et de partir plus tard ce qui nous a fait gagner presque une journée suivant les horaires d'avion. De plus, elle s'est montrée réactive aux messages. La situation de la maison est idéale pour découvrir la ville (3' à pied de la Torre dos Clérigos). La literie est bonne et la rue est très calme la nuit (sauf les mouettes de grand matin mais cela fait partie du charme!). Des traces d'humidité sont visibles dans l'armoire de cuisine à droite de l'évier (rendant le grille-pain inutilisable) et la vaisselle méritait d'être relavée (locataires précédents?). Pour les amateurs de tapas, allez découvrir sur la place de la Torre dos Clérigos le BRICK CLERIGOS.
Las valoraciones de la casa de Ana son muy acertadas, hemos estado muy a gusto, la situación es magnífica y ella encantadora. Sin duda la recomendamos!!
Helpful host. Nice, clean appartment, ideal for a family. Good location in the middle of the old town of porto. Thanks!
Ana is an excellent host. Her apartment was sparkling clean, the bedding was very comfortable, and we didn't wish for anything more. We were 5 adults and would definitely recommend Ana's home.
Fantastic apartment in an excellent location. Across 3 floors, loads of space and within (sometimes hilly!) walking distance to everywhere you’ll want to visit in Porto. Would definitely stay again!
Great place, excellent location, helpful host.

name: COPACABANA BEACH- REVEILLON -WI FI FREE -Cable TV
summary: My space is in Copacabana Beach, 2 large bedrooms with WI FI AND TV A CABO IN THE ROOM AND IN THE ROOM, SUPER QUADRA of the beach - 100m, 8 min walk from the Metro, Taxis, Bus lines, Banks, Supermarkets. You will love my space for being IN THE QUADRA of the most famous beach in the world - Copacabana. My space is good for couples, business travelers and families (with and without children), groups that come to lectures and events. We make a contract for your safety!
space: Certamente você tem Copacabana como opção por ser um dos lugares TOP de turismo do Mundo!! Em nosso espaço, você ficará confortavelmente instalado, com estrutura sensacional, na quadra principal de Copacabana - in Copacabana heart, ente Rua Siqueira Campos e Rua Figueiredo Magalhães
description: My space is in Copacabana Beach, 2 large bedrooms with WI FI AND TV A CABO IN THE ROOM AND IN THE ROOM, SUPER QUADRA of the beach - 100m, 8 min walk from the Metro, Taxis, Bus lines, Banks, Supermarkets. You will love my space for being IN THE QUADRA of the most famous beach in the world - Copacabana. My space is good for couples, business travelers and families (with and without children), groups that come to lectures and events. We make a contract for your safety! METRÔ, BUS LINE, TAXIS
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana é o coração do Rio de Janeiro, estamos NA quadra da praia, 100M DE distância e apenas 8 min a pé do metrô!! Dezenas de opções de restaurantes, comércio farto, bancos, farmácias e várias outras facilidades no mesmo quarteirão!
access: Poderão acessar todo o imóvel, são 2 quartos que podem ou não ser interligados através de porta de correr com tranca. Ideal para 2 casais ou casais com filhos, que necessitam de quartos conjugados
interaction: Posso lhe ajudar com troca de informações de lugares para visitar e curtir no Rio - tenho um roteiro montado para lhe enviar por email, se for de seu interesse!
house_rules: - Visitas NÃO SÃO permitidas, fornecemos roupa de cama e banho, 1 vaga em GARAGEM COBERTA incluída, no mesmo prédio -Wi Fi e Tv a cabo -Infelizmente não temos como acomodar seu bichinho de estimação -Qualquer alteração na configuração e ocupação do imóvel - troca de hóspedes, hóspedes extras, entre outros, deverá ser previamente comunicada ao proprietário-sob pena de cancelamento da reserva

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Amante de viagens e passeios. Gosto de conhecer lugares pelo mundo junto da minha família

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Carolina a été extrêmement sympathique avec nous, de notre arrivée, jusqu'à notre départ. L'appartement est très propre, exactement comme sur la photo, proche de la plage, du métro et dans un quartier rempli de commerces et de restaurants. Marché animé le dimanche. Idéal pour séjourner à Rio, en famille. A noter que l'appartement est en rez-de-chaussée, et donc un peu sombre, ce qui ne nous a pas dérangé car il donne sur une petite cour très calme. Un plus, la place de parking qui est indispensable dans ce quartier si l'on a une voiture !

A Carolina e seu esposo foram bem hospitaleiros e prestativos, a localização do apartamento é excelente, a uma quadra da praia, próximo a vários restaurantes, barzinhos, supermercados, uns 10 min a pé do metro, o apartamento é super aconchegante, e apesar de não ter ar-condicionado, os ventiladores de teto são muito bons, além do apartamento não pegar sol, o ar não fez falta . Pelo custo beneficio, superou as minhas expectativas. Voltarei com certeza.

A Carolina foi super atenciosa, sempre nos orientando com dicas de passeios. O apartamento é espaçoso e confortável, tudo muito limpo e organizado. A localização é excelente, fica bem próximo ao calçadão de Copacabana e também de bares e restaurantes.
A estadia foi excelente. Obrigada Carolina pelo carinho.

It is a great apartment. Just a perfect location in Copacabana and very close to the beach! Carolina and her husband are really nice and help wherever they can. It was a really nice stay for my friend and I. Also the people and doorman in the house are very friendly. Can only recommend to go there!

Carolina mantuvo una comunicación continua desde el primer mensaje, el departamento es tal cual las fotos, lo mejor fue entre otros la ubicación y la seguridad ya que cuenta con dos porteros uno en el hall de ingreso y otro que maneja el estacionamiento, los cuales fueron cordiales y atentos  seguramente volveremos a elegir el departamento de Carolina en el futuro para otra estadía en Rio de janeiro

Se for colocar todos os pontos positivos da hospedagem eu não teria espaço e tempo para faze-lo. Então vou colocar os pontos mais importantes que fizeram da nossa estadia ser prazerosa, confortável e muito agradável.
1- Localização (fica próximo do coração de copacabana, praia, metro, avenidas principais , restaurantes (24 horas),mercados.
2- Apartamento muito agradável,limpo, grande (maior que nas fotos de apresentação), com tv a cabo, ar condicionado, wifi e até o pessoal da portaria muito receptivo.
3- Carolina e família, são pessoas super bacanas, nos receberam como se fossemos da família e sempre preocupados em nos deixar super bem. Super atenciosa, foi bem flexível com meus horários e com certeza não poderia ser melhor anfitriã.

Esses pontos garantiram uma estadia muito boa, voltaremos nos hospedar la com toda certeza e já estamos recomendando a família e amigos próximos.

Esta foi minha primeira experiência com o Airbnb e estou até agora encantada com a estadia maravilhosa. O espaço da Carolina é incrível, ainda melhor do que nas fotos. O apartamento é amplo, confortável, limpo, extremamente bem equipado e, principalmente, localizado. Está à uma quadra de Copacabana, tem mercados, bares, padarias, tudo à disposição e muito perto. Utilizamos a vaga de garagem gratuitamente e a equipe do edifício foi sempre muito solícita e atenciosa. Carolina e seu marido nos receberam com muito carinho, deixaram água gelada e gelo já à disposição, balinhas, toalhas e todo o tipo de conforto possível. Nos sentimos em casa nestes dias, pudemos até assistir o jogo do nosso time na libertadores graças à Tv à cabo. Só posso recomendar fortemente este apartamento e agradecer à Carolina pela excelente hospedagem.

O apartamento é exatamente como demonstrado nas fotos do anuncio. Espaçoso, confortável e com ótimo custo benefício! Excelente para casais com ou sem filhos. A localização é ótima! Para quem gosta de uma caminhada tranquila na orla, é possível ir à pé também para outras praias fora de Copacabana, como Leme, Arpoador e Ipanema. Não gastamos mais do que 5 minutos de caminhada para chegar à estação do metrô (Siqueira Campos)! A proprietária é muita simpática, educada e sempre solícita!

Adoramos o apartamento por ser bem próximo a praia de Copacabana, com várias opções de restaurante, farmácia, subway, 24 horas, tudo perto. O apartamento é perfeito em tamanho, privacidade, limpeza, cozinha perfeita pra uma estadia inclusive em família devido ao grande espaço em todos os ambientes. Só temos ótimas recomendações ao que pretendem se hospedar. A Carolina, nossa anfitriã, é um amor e esteve em contato conosco sempre.

estive hospedado por 30 dias no apartamento de Carolina, o apartamento é bem localizado, bem mobiliado, próximo a bares, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias, etc... Carolina e seu esposo me receberam muito bem, tivemos ótima comunicação e o tempo de resposta foi bem rápido, o preço foi justo, gostei muito de ficar hospedado lá e recomendo a quem quiser se hospedar no coração de Copacabana. Obrigado Carolina.

reviews.comments:
Located just five minute's walk from a major bus artery and from there only a 5min ride to the Blue Line (Metro), Paschale and Julien's home is the perfect base-camp for families looking to explore Montreal and return to a quiet neighborhood at night. 

While located within a 20min drive of all major attractions, we parked the van for three solid days and explored the city via public transit and on foot. Within a 7min walk of the home is a Provigo (chain mid-range grocery) two large parks with wading pools, tennis courts, basketball and baseball spaces, and even publicly available piano to play. Near one park is a fantastic breakfast place and a row of shops on Rue Beaubien including artisianal cheese and meat shops. So you needn't travel far to live like a native and entertain the children.

The home itself easily sleeps 7 (we were 5 including 3 children ages 7 to 12) and provides adequate cooking, dining, and sitting space. Clean, bright, and cozy, we felt right at home. 

Situated on the main/basement floors of a 3-storey walk-up, the main floor features three bedrooms and an office we repurposed as a fourth bedroom, using the trundle bed from one of the children's bedrooms. No air-conditioning, but the windows and fans proved more than adequate for the mild weather this week (no highs above 28C).

The bathrooms are nice, especially the newly remodelled basement bath with walk-in shower and attractive vanity. The basement also provides another bedroom and a sitting area with couch and futon facing a large TV; a comfortable space that could easily sleep two.

We are sorry our trip had to end. We would gladly stay here again. So glad we found this spot and hosts!

host.host_about:
I was born and raised in Switzerland, into a family of watchmakers, engineers, doctors, architects, artists, musicians, and missionaries. Uncles, aunts and cousins doing God's work all over the world, people not principally interested in money. Not to say that I do not approve of wealth and power. My grandfather, after all, was a wealthy man, founding a watch company more than 100 years ago, but let your good fortune be applied for a good purpose. 

Religion, however, is too confusing for me to understand, so I stick to nature. This is my guide in life. And it has worked very well for me so far. For these reasons, science, culture, politics. social justice, economics and all the things that make this world go round are of great interest to me. I'm green politically, blue in many ways, my eyes, my jeans, my bathroom towels, my mood once in a while, blue is good, I feel fine. Red and black attracts me, but generally, I will try to keep a cool head. White is beautiful, but what or who is spotless? Yellow and orange are great, who does not like sunshine? But I prefer gold. And silver would be my blue. It suites me better. I'll tell you more at a later point. 

Blond originally, but most hair that remains on my body is in all other places than on my head. I shave off the rest, with some stubble remaining once in a while when I'm just too lazy. I am a mountain person, strong, agile, in good shape. Style? Always appropriate for the occasion. Quality is what matters. And who does not recognize that, oh well, simply does not recognize it.

reviews.comments: Mr Stefan is a gentleman, the rooms is clean and beautiful. the location is in center, excelent place. You can have a bike on the side street, near metrô, near Manhattan. Everything ok

If you want to stay in a typical loft in NYC/Brooklyn, this is a right place. The loft complies with the description and Stefan was very helpfull and discret. The loft is very well located, in Brooklyn, close to Bedford Av and Metropolitan Av. Very easy to reach NYC by subway (One stope from Bedford av) or bicycle. Just one thing...PERFECT.
This has been by far my favorite place I’ve stayed at while using Airbnb. Stefan’s home is beautiful and eccentric and he is a very warm and kind host. We loved every aspect of our stay here.
It’s perfectly located, really easy to get around both Brooklyn and Manhattan. I had a great stay with Stefan.

Stylish Brooklyn loft.  Great location a short walk from the L into Manhattan.  Clean and comfortable.  Stefan is very friendly, communicative, and knowledgeable.  I really enjoyed my stay and hope to visit again!

I spent a month at Stefan's place and it was one of the best AirBnB experiences I've had so far! The loft is absolutely amazing – cozy, creative and clean.  Located in the heart of wonderful Williamsburg with many bars, restaurants and shopping facilities around the corner and just a short walk to L train (Bedford Avenue station) and East River ferry (North Williamsburg stop). And last but not least: Stefan is a great, very obliging host, always in a good mood and up for a laugh. I can highly recommend this place!

In the last year and a half I have stayed in 20+ Airbnbs in NYC.  Stefan’s place is by far the best.  

On top of that Stefan is a wonderful host and a great person.

You can’t go wrong with this spot.  Enjoy!
Absolutely recommended! The most beautiful Airbnb I have stayed in thus far, in an amazing location in Williamsburg!

Accueil chaleureux et attentionné .Stefan parle plusieurs langues parfaitement
Loft très bien décoré et bien chauffé...on se sent comme à la maison

I would thoroughly recommend this space to anyone wanting to explore Brooklyn/Manhattan. Stefan's place was fantastic. Convenient location, warm and clean space, and excellent amenities. Stefan was very obliging; his responses were very fast, and he made sure I had everything I needed. Thanks!

The loft is exactly as you see it: big, spacious, with style. Close to subway & ferry and you get to Manhattan in 20 minutes. 
Quiet, respectful & easy going, great comunication with Stefan.

reviews.comments:
O espaço do Paulo é maravilhoso, recém remodelado com muito bom gosto. As acomodações são ótimas e a cozinha é muito bem equipada. O espaço é perto do metro, com ótimos acessos à região central de Gaia e ao Porto. 
O melhor de tudo foi a hospitalidade dos anfitriões. Paulo teve um cuidado muito grande para que não faltasse nada para a nossa estadia, e nos recepcionou como se fôssemos da família. 
Recomendamos muito! Com certeza o melhor lugar em que eu já me hospedei

Melhor apt em Gaia!! Se tivesse como avaliar em 6 estrelas, o faria.

O que vc procura em um apt??
Nao pagar muito para morar bem?  ✓
Estar bem localizado, perto de tudo, inclusive do metro, e ao mesmo tempo num locar tranquilo, silencioso e agradavel?  ✓
Um excelente host, que faz de tudo para que sua estadia seja a melhor possivel? ✓
Que seja um apt super agradavel, amplo, com boa temperatura, boa vista, bem iluminado, bem decorado e confortavel, literalmente com TUDO o que precisa?  ✓
Poucos vizinhos e ninguem para lhe chatear?  ✓

Enfim, super recomendado, em todos os aspectos, e ainda me arrisco a dizer que seria bem dificil achar um host melhor e mais atencioso do que o Paulo.

When I arrived at the airport Paulo was there to pick me up which I really appreciate as the airport isn't that close. Paulo drove me to the apartment and when we were driving to there he showed me some things in Porto and he explained me where everything was and how to get there. Once we were at the apartment he showed me the apartment and told me where I can find everything. After I dropped my suitcase at the apartment Paulo took me with him and helped me with the groceries and took me for lunch which was really nice as a first day there. Late in the afternoon when I got back at the apartment. 
The apartment was very clean and the beds also already were made. There even was coffee already for the espresso machine so I didn’t have to buy it myself! What also was nice of the apartment is that it’s really close to the metro which will bring you very fast to Porto.
 In the two weeks I stayed in Porto I've seen Paulo several times. His hospitality and friendliness  plus the amazing apartment really made me feel like home. After one week of staying in the apartment Paulo and Carla (his wife) even came to clean again which was very kind of them. Paulo also made sure if I had everything I needed at the apartment which I really appreciated. 
I really wish I could have stayed longer at the apartment. But in the future I will definitely come back to it. I recommend this apartment to everyone as the apartment is beautiful and the price for two weeks was really good aswell. It truly were a unforgettable two weeks for me. Thank you so much Paulo and Carla!

reviews.comments:
Uma casa óptima para um retiro e para um convívio com amigos. Localizada numa zona extremamente calma, a quinta Adágio é uma casa incrível com uma piscina óptima e condições óptimas. O Sr. Cipriano é muito simpático e atencioso, sempre disponível. Adoramos a estadia. 
Recomendo para umas férias calmas e essencialmente para um convívio com amigos com churrasco, boas conversas e tardes na piscina fantástica.

Un paraje espectacular y un alojamiento a la altura de lo esperado. Un placer descansar unos días en un lugar así. 100% recomendable para todo aquel que quiera disfrutar del Pais vecino, Cipriano está atento en todo momento, y te recibe con una botella de brut, a la casa no le falta detalle, carbón, barbacoa, freidora.....todo lo que puedas imaginarte y mas, la piscina espectacular, sin ninguna duda repetiremos experiencia

Para todos os que procuram descansar uns dias com amigos ou família, podem esperar o melhor deste espaço. A casa tem ótimas condições com muito espaço e tudo o que é (Website hidden by Airbnb) piscina e a zona de churrasco muito agradável.  
O Cipriano mostrou-se sempre disponível desde a reserva e  deixou-nos muito á vontade. Um espaço para voltar noutra ocasião.

Una casa perfecta si buscas tranquilidad y te acompaña el buen tiempo. Es simplemente preciosa y tiene todo lo necesario para que tu estancia sea más que cómoda. La piscina, el jardín y su cenador con horno y barbacoa son estupendos y Cipriano te facilita la leña y el carbón vegetal !!.
El trato es exquisito, siempre atento a tu llamada (para lo que sea) pero en ningún momento aparece por el alojamiento si no es requerido. La zona donde se ubica la casa es la típica aldea portuguesa, similar a las existentes en Galicia y su entorno, montes y rios, es espectacular. A pocos minutos enuentras bares, restaurantes y zonas de asadores/merenderos y, si quieres hacer compras, en Vale do Cambra hay de todo.
Una experiencia genial !!!

Dépaysement garanti ! 
Très bon séjour,Cipriano est un hôte remarquable,pleins de petites attentions envers ses voyageurs
A recommander sans hésitation
Um espaço agradável, bonito e rural, para escapar ao dia a dia das grandes cidades, ideal para momentos em família e/ou refúgio a dois.
Obriagdo Cipriano, excelente casa!

Hemos pasado 4 días en la casa de Cipriano y la estancia ha sido perfecta. La casa impecable y con muchos servicios, una chimenea estupenda que canlentaba toda los radiadores de la casa a la perfección, el salón muy cómodo para los 8 que fuimos, y la cocina muy completa, con todo. Volveremos, Cipriano. Gracias.

Foi uma ótima estadia. A casa é muito confortável e está totalmente (Website hidden by Airbnb) a lareira e o aquecimento dá um conforto ainda maior. Sleeping area is separate from the living room, terrace and kitchen so a nice rest is assured even with some guests staying at the living room. Kitchen is complete with stoves, oven, microwave, freezer, fridge, coffee machine and everything you need to cook great meals while in Barcelona. Both bathrooms have a nice bath to relax after a long day!

neighborhood_overview: HAPPY NEIGHBOURHOOD Paral.lel and Poble Sec are barrios included in the district called Montjuïc. Paral.lel is an avenue that cuts down from picturesque Plaça Espanya right down to the World Trade Centre at the tip of the port. Poble Sec is an area spreading out from the middle of Paral.lel. The areas are safe and primarily residential but there is much entertainment to be had as well. This includes popular bars, theatre and even a club. However, whilst Paral.lel is a busy thoroughfare during the day, the areas are quiet and just a 10-20 minute walk to the centre of the city and Las Ramblas. A good choice if you want to be central but away from the crowds of tourists that populate more central areas. Montjuïc and Plaça Espanya are also very close by. The event halls and the Palau de Congressos near Plaça espanya also make the (URL HIDDEN) Poble Sec area perfect for those in Barcelona on business. Although both Plaça Espanya and Montjuïc have a lot to offer tourists as well. There are s

This is necessary in the hot weather, thank you! The garbage bins are located very close to your apartment - near the main front door. They are the big grey plastic containers - you can't miss them! Cheers!  - Most importantly relax and enjoy your stay! RESPECT FOR NEIGHBOURS. As the apartment is very quiet, for the centre of Barcelona, or any part of Barcelona, for that matter, I ask visitors to be mindful of noise levels. summary: New 2014 Montreal West Island charming house in the heart of the nature offers guest an unique quiet and comfortably place to stay. The place is fully equipped with quality appliances in an open concept kitchen. It can accommodate up to 10 adults and 2 children . The house has a high speed internet access WiFi network, smart TV with Netflix and other applications available and phone with unlimited Canada and USA calls provided.
space: Place has a spacious living room and a kitchen with quality appliances and a generous island. The dinning table is extendable and can accommodate 8-10 persons. A powder room can be also accessed at the same level. There are 3 closed private bedrooms at the second level of the house and a large bathroom with 2 sinks. The basement has a queen size bed and a sofa bed, a gorgeous wood finished bar, a second full bathroom and quality washer and dryer machines. From the dining room there is access to a patio, terrace and private fenced backyard.

neighborhood_overview: House is situated next to "Bois-de-l'Île-Bizard Nature Park" a place that will give multiple choice of nature activities due to the diverse range of ecosystems present. On the island there are 3 golf circuits: "The Royal Montreal Golf Club", "Golf Saint-Raphael" and "Elm Ridge Country Club".  The Royal Montreal Golf Club is the oldest golf club in North America, and the oldest in continuous existence. It was founded in Montreal in 1873 and permission was granted by Queen Victoria to use the prefix "Royal" in 1884. House is within 3 minutes driving distance to restaurant, gas station and supermarket area that includes groceries, pharmacy, cleaning services and fast-food.  Within 5 minutes driving you can access  2 skating rinks, Sportplexe Pierrefonds and St. Raphael Sports Complex.  Access to the train station can be made by public transit or 15 minutes driving. The airport is situated at 25 minutes driving and Montreal downtown can be accessed in approximately 40 minutes. For winter s
notes: House is suitable for maximum 10 adults and 2 children 2-12 years old.
transit: Public transportation is within walking distance (aprox. 7 minutes).
access: Guest will have access to entire house except bedrooms which will be available depending on number of guests booked. Basement is considered a bedroom for 4 guests.
interaction: I'll be available to help at any time through emails and sometime in person to ensure a very pleasant experience during guest stay at "Maison Chez Maria"
house_rules: * No shoes in the house. * Quiet hours 23:00 - 07:00 per local residential code requirements.  * Kettle, toaster and coffee maker to be used at the edge of the counter top. * Smoking of any kind is not allowed in the house but can be done outside. Breach of this rule will attract a fee of 300 CAD from the deposit.  * Any kind of parties or events are not allowed and all non-paying guests must leave the property before mid-night.  Please respect our property and our neighbors. You are responsible for any disturbance coming from the unit during your stay.

host.host_about: Happy couple with two children. Love to travel, cook and enjoy the nature.

reviews.comments: The place was very clean and neat.  I've never an airbnb that clean.  Check in and check out was very easy.  Great experience.
It’s a best place for vacation for friends and family

Highly recommend. The home is very clean and and well depicted in the AirBnB posting. It is in a quiet neighborhood with lots of parking.  The hosts were very quick to respond to any request we had. The nearby Park-nature Du Bois-de-l'ile-Bizard was a great spot for a hike.
Chez Maria is a beautiful clean house. Her and her husband made sure I had everything I needed.

A beautiful house .. very clean with all the amenities.  Every little thing has been well thought of. Maria is an amazing host and was continuously checking on our comfort throughout the period of our stay. An amazing place to stay anytime of the year

name: Ocean & golf course views!! 3 BR/2BA Sleeps 7
summary: Our Kona Vacation Villa is a spacious 3 bedroom (2 bath) condo offering spectacular sunset views, nearby ocean and beach access, restaurants and entertainment, art and culture. Room for the whole family with beach gear and many amenities! Since 2012 we have hosted hundreds of guests including families, couples, and business travelers. We live at our nearby Equestrian Center and continue to enjoy sharing the Kona experience with our visitors!
space: Our spacious home on the golf course (18th tee) has fabulous views and comfortable furnishings. BBQ on your own lanai! (Unavailable in many other condos) King, Queen, 3 twins (and a futon); 3 pools on site, hot tubs, tennis and pickle ball.  Walk to beach, shopping, snorkeling & many ocean adventures! Wi-Fi, cable, XBox, large flat screen in living area, smaller in loft and 2nd bedroom.  Fully stocked kitchen for cooking & dishware for a crowd. Large dining table on lanai.  We provide boogie boards, snorkel equip., coolers, umbrella, beach bags & chairs: A LUXURY VACATION ON A FAMILY-FRIENDLY BUDGET! Beautiful lanai with fantastic ocean/sunset view, right on the 18th tee of the Kona Country Club Golf Course   Walk to Keauhou Bay and the Keauhou Shopping Center where there is a Tri-plex movie theater, an excellent grocery store with many local foods, a Saturday Farmer's Market, many great restaurants, CVS/Long's, Urgent Care and other shopping opportunities:  A VERY short drive to Kahal

neighborhood_overview: Country Club Villas is near the south end of the Ali'i Drive (waterfront) resort district. Walking, running, and biking are very popular in this neighborhood.Being outside of "town"  is less crowded but with excellent access to all of Kona's activities (many available at Keauhou Bay, just across the golf course) and travel to all the Big Island adventures. Keauhou Shopping Center is a 5-minute walk and is our "go-to" for grocery shopping.
transit: Designated parking just steps from the entrance; visitor parking for additional vehicles nearby. There is a "Kona Trolley" system  (info in condo) that runs all of Ali'i drive and into town for additional shopping and restaurants/entertainment.
access: You will be pleased with the spaciousness of this condo (1240 sq ft).  There are books, games, videos and beach toys for your use. Books in loft are to share and take home if you like. Living room has an assortment of books on visiting the Big Island, the Hawaii atlas, hawaiiana flora and fauna, sea life and much more!
interaction: Cyndy and Pat live just minutes away. Cyndy has lived in Kona since 1979 and Pat since 1998. We are happy to share our experiences and local knowledge with our guests.  (At Horseplay Equestrian Center just up the mountain from the condo Cyndy teaches english riding and boards horses.)

host.host_about:
Kona, Hawai 32+ years.
Mother, grandmother, wife, friend, riding instructor. 
Love: reading, music, riding, silence, listening, learning...

reviews.comments:
This condo was great and Cyndy could not have been a better host! Just a short drive from grocery stores, restaurants and downtown Kona made this a great location. The view from the back balcony (overlooking the golf course) was so beautiful and a great sight to wake up to. 

Cyndy provided all of the information we needed, as well as all kitchen necessities and food/cooking basics. Aside from the kitchen, the bathrooms had plenty of toilet paper, the closet had any towels/sheets we needed and then some. All beach towels, coolers, beach chairs, umbrellas, boogie boards and other beach/water accessories were provided and GREATLY appreciated.

Make note that the condo is not air conditioned, but that is VERY common and to be expected at most places in Kona. My group was very excited about the board games, however they were definitely a bit outdated, and missing some pieces. The remotes to the ceiling fans in the living room were a bit confusing and we couldn't figure out the lights (the lamp on the side table wouldn't work) so it was a bit dark at night.

Aside from those very small things, this condo was so wonderful for our group and we definitely recommend it to others.

We couldn't have asked for a better stay! Cyndy's place was immaculate, well stocked and sparkling clean. She offered us great advise  from directions to local eateries. Her place has a fantastic view of the ocean and golf course, is close to everything yet just far enough away from the noise to enjoy a peaceful evening. Cyndy was very polite and thoughtful. Truly a 5 star host! would go back anytime
